frontmatter.courseTitle: Advance Concepts of Service Meshes - Hands On
frontmatter.description: A course on advanced aspects of service mesh through the lens of Istio.
Meshery is the service mesh management plane which offers lifecycle, configuration, and performance management of service meshes and their workloads.
